trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were 4 other sightings in Fort Worth on or around March 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWell, once again, strange things in the sky, very close, under a mile or so in the distance, I see a comet like object very bright white light that gets larger, maybe up to basketball size, then form a tail and begin to decrease in size and turn into a perfect brilliant green sphere and quickly turn small and disintegrate before ever reaching ground. It was so fast that by the time I could open the door for my daughter to see it had gone..anyone else see this happen?
